content.detailedDescription:
Location: apt balcony
witness: air vehicle with no noise but big object for being low.
common vehicle in area: seen many planes landing path to orlando int and personal
ariplane landing in near lake. vehicle is not fast enough for flight movement
to land or small for no noise. i have over
24 years of military service, look to me like a fast triangle blimp.
weather: low cloud and street lights.
object did not turn lights until over lake and then turn off once on sr-436.
no observible noice but the did turn off light once the turn from my direction and turn away.
time between lights on on video to ligths turn off on photo, 15 seconds.
content.summary: Possible triangle blimp over orlando, fl

content.detailedDescription: I began looking at the sky around 9:30 last night, the sky cleared up from the rain so i left my window wide open to look at the stars. at about 10pm, i saw lights blinking towards the west, i thought it was just a plane but it was blinking like a strobe light in the same spot off in the distance for 30 minutes before i decided to take out my telescope. when i pointed it at the blinking lights, my heart literally stopped! i screamed to my boyfriend, who was also amazed by these lights, "that's a f@#%ing spacecraft, dude!" he ran to look through the telescope and was in complete agreement that it was not anything he'd ever seen before! it was a diagonal line of lights, at one end, a steady green light. at the opposite end, there was a steady orangish light - in the middle were 3 erratically blinking white lights and in between the white and orange lights were distinctly smaller red flashing lights. my boyfriend and i were quick to get outside opinions, we yelled for my roommates who were also astonished at the sights of this craft-like object. we all watched for over an hour as this craft slowly hovered from left to right and saw a single orangish orb of light which appeared to dock with this vehicle and quickly drift away. between 11:30 and 12, a large/bright white star-like object was also visible coming from that direction. we all watched as it ever-so-slightly drifted across the sky and over our house. we all ran outside to watch this light drift through the sky and slowly out of sight (northeast). as for the craft-like object, it was visible for about another 30 minutes and was drifting from side to side, which was clearly visible from the telescope and even visible with the naked eye. i was also able to record a video of the flashing lights through the telescope with my phone.
content.summary: Diagonal string of flashing lights hovering in sky - orange orb docks. star-like object drifts across sky.

content.detailedDescription:
On or about august 2nd, 1962, i and seven members of my family observed lights in the shae of a "v" appear in a portion of the sky about 75 degrees above then cross the sky silently and make a sharp turn (randomly with each crossing)  and the disappear. there were multiple v shapes which performed this way at various starting and ending points in the sky. at the highly of this display there were at least three or four shapes performing this consistently.  the entire anomaly took about 10 minutes to complete. 
i was 10 years old at the time, the youngest person to witness the event. several adults also witnessed this event with one still living. other adolescents can also verify my account.
after all these years i wanted to offer this first hand account for review and recording.
content.summary: Lights in v shape appeared at one section of the sky then fly silently across portion of sky then disappear- all silently

content.detailedDescription:
Approx driving route:  i was leaving from my lunch break in my car driving. was driving n on n. 9th ave in greeley, heading towards approx 4th street, possibly 3rd or 5th. can't recall as i am unfamiliar w/ greeley streets and i was running late to work. as soon as i turned n. onto 9th ave, it was obvious, quite low and right in front of me. i guess approx 200-300 ft above. (i at first kept heading w towards 10th, towards my work, really wondering what i am seeing,rationalizing probably birds, but realizing they are too strange to be birds) because i was late,better ignore my thoughts and intrique). then suddenly thought, no, too odd, gonna follow them towards the e.  i had to head a bit n first , then turn right to head e down another road to follow them. eventually they disappeard from view because of treetops and they moved fast...I did pull over at the end (approx two min of driving and following w/ my eyes) and i tried to take 2 cell phone photos, but really at that point they were too far away and didn't show up.
 what i saw: i saw about 10 or more, maybe 12, group of white orbs/circles, and then a small separated group of 3 white orbs or circles heading s.E. they were almost in formation of birds, but not quite. they were bouncing around in and out of formation. i immediately thought and felt they weren't birds, although i rationalized that they were a group of pelicans or some group of very  white birds. but they did weird dropping out of formation and kind of floating away from formation (mostly the large group) they also changed shapes. went from round to chevron, to oval or egg like shape, randomly. they moved quickly and they disappeard from sight pretty quickly as treetops obscured the view. however i got 3 or 4 really good views as i drove along. they changed shapes, moved oddly and floated around. at one point, and what has convinced me that these are not birds, is that the second or third time i had a very clear view, and they were close, there was a very clear, reflection off of one of them in the large formation. i knew it could not be a bird. it clearly reflected like metal or almost bright enough like a mirror. it was in it's chevron like form when it had the reflection.
 the formations (both small and large) kept moving s.E. and i left. 
the only emotions or reactions i had were intrique and then regret that i didn't follow it right as soon as i saw it. i could have gotten a better photo perhaps. they did move fast however and treetops obscured them.
content.shape: Chevron,   Circle,   Egg,   Oval,   Sphere,   Square,   Rectagular,   Triangle
content.summary: Saw total of approx 12-15 round orbs/changing shapes, flying in odd patterns,daytime
